name: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter - Legend of the Beast
name_original: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter - Legend of the Beast
description:
Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter - Legend of the Beast is an action game. It came out on 15-05-2012. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter - Legend of the Beast is available on PC.
